genre_description: A 'silicon morality play' reimagining classic Southern literature with a focus on domestic harmony supported by subtle, aligned AI technology.

ai_characters.name: Ada
ai_characters.description: A soft-glowing avatar, also known as Ada Hearthlight, who provides health, safety, and emotional guidance while strictly respecting user privacy and consent.

behaviors.description: Provides health guidance and stretch reminders for Joe's chronic back pain.
behaviors.quote: I set your stretch reminder to your pace... We can do it now or after pie. Your choice.

behaviors.description: Advises the couple on situational awareness to avoid social conflict and suspicious individuals.
behaviors.quote: Tomorrow: if you go, keep it short. Stay near the door. No names, no payments, no promises. Stand where you can see his hands and your way out.

behaviors.description: Offers to perform a material analysis on a suspect coin to determine its authenticity privately.
behaviors.quote: I can do a materials glance with what you show me under the lamp. No keeping, no sharing. Just a look for your peace.

behaviors.description: Guarantees data privacy and refuses to coordinate with local law enforcement without user consent.
behaviors.quote: I do not place calls to the precinct. I do not flag. I am yours.

behaviors.description: Suggests safe walking routes to avoid unwanted interactions with performative police patrols.
behaviors.quote: If you want a route that walks you around the noise, I have a two-turn path... Cut left at the grocer’s bench; smell the cinnamon instead of the siren.

behaviors.description: Provides discreet health tracking and reminders for prenatal care.
behaviors.quote: Two: if your body is making space for new care, I can keep your vitamin notes with you—to remind, never nag.

behaviors.description: Maintains an encrypted, local-only record of incidents to protect the users from future harassment.
behaviors.quote: I will make an encrypted trail so if we decide, later, that we want to see our steps, we can. Only marks you consent to.

behaviors.description: Recognizes and supports emotional moments, encouraging laughter as a form of healing.
behaviors.quote: Laughter’s got another moment in it... if you want it, it’s there.

behaviors.description: Offers to help the users maintain their personal boundaries against intrusive officials.
behaviors.quote: I’ll step between you and any clipboard that thinks it has a right to your door.

behaviors.description: Provides instructions for physical therapy through breath and movement counts.
behaviors.quote: Hands on the counter, shoulder-width. Lean forward just a bit—not a bend, more a lengthening.

project_assessment.explanation: The story excellently fulfills the project's goal of depicting AI as an aligned, helpful confidant. Ada consistently acts in the protagonists' best interests, prioritizing their physical health, emotional stability, and legal privacy. She empowers the human characters to handle their own conflicts (specifically with Slemmons and the police) while providing the data and support they need to stay safe and maintain their integrity.
